display_name: Slow-release CCBS = NIFSR or DIHSR or VERSR or DLTSR or AMLOD (SHHS1)
description: Participant taking SLOW-RELEASE CCBS = NIFSR OR DIHSR OR VERSR OR DLTSR OR AMLOD within two weeks of the SHHS1 visit.  All medications were recorded during the interview, and medication information was later categorized by physician review.
